channel.title: Beginer 508 LD client easy to custimize with all new sprites and customs
channel.description:
Hi im giving up on all rsps(slows my computer and not worth it) and i don't think my server was worthy to be released but i thought my client was it has 7 custom items and all the new sprites It has 3 Notepads including How to change the IP Codes for customs and How to change sprites to change name of the window when client is open go to applet_sub1.java and search hoop and replace with whatever you want You can leech the hell out of this client i don't care just please give me 10% credits for client Pictures [img]http://i762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/Untitled2-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/Untitled-4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i762.photobucket.com/albums/xx267/hoopman0123/3.jpg[/img]
Client Link [url=http://www.multiupload.com/CI4IRN6TS2]http://www.multiupload.com/CI4IRN6TS2[/url] that is rapidshare,megaupload,Z share, and uploading.com

item.title: Beginer 508 LD client easy to custimize with all new sprites and customs
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

i honestly like the client. because of the sprites because im to damn lazy to add my own.
But i might add this if you dident leech il wait until more comments are added.

8/10 if not leeched not saying it is… i honestly have no idea

The reason 8/10 is because it has custom items.
And i dont like costume items
